response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which we believe would greatly benefit you based on your needs and preferences. Given its value to you, we're extending this exclusive opportunity at a special introductory price of $120. This is an exceptional deal considering the product's worth to you stands at $150. We're confident it will meet and exceed your expectations. Please let us know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 120}
